history.proof: intros m z t H1 H2. split. - intros [H3 H4]. apply exds_orb_eq_ex_large; auto. shelve. - split. + shelve. + shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expo1 m z t <-> exds (Iter_orb m z) t

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
expo1 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (let p := Iter_upb m z in exists j : nat, j < p /\ Iter (f m) j z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
exds = fix exds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | Vs => False | Is s0 x => x = z \/ exds s0 z end : set -> dart -> Prop
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
Iter_orb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => set_minus (fmap_to_set m) (Iter_rem m z) : fmap -> dart -> set
dart = nat : Set
expo_eq_exds_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expo m z t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
expo_expo1 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t < -> expo1 m z t
exds_rem_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m t -> ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
expo1_ex_j : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in ex_j m z t (p - 1) < -> expo1 m z t
expo1_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> {expo1 m z t} + {~ expo1 m z t}
exds_orb_eq_ex_large : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let p := Iter_upb m z in exds s t < -> (exists i : nat, Iter (f m) i z = t)
L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := Iter_rem m z in let nr := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | i < nr /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
exds_orb_eq_ex : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let p := Iter_upb m z in exds s t < -> (exists i : nat, i < p /\ Iter (f m) i z = t)
L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
PL2 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> card s <= ndN m -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | i < nr /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
exds_orb_ex : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let p := Iter_upb m z in exds s t -> {i : nat | i < p /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
PL3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
LR3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), ~ exds s t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t
ex_j_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat), {ex_j m z t n} + {~ ex_j m z t n}
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
P4 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> card s <= ndN m -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | i < nr /\ Iter (f m) i z = t} : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Set
R3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => ~ exds s t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
ex_j_exist_j : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat), ex_j m z t n < -> (exists j : nat, j <= n /\ Iter (f m) j z = t)
exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f m) n z)
M.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z
f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z
M.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f m (M.f_1 m z) = z
degree_per : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) (degree m z) z = z
exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z)
exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> diff_orb m z
upb_eq_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter_upb m z = degree m z
incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
card_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> card (Iter_orb m x) = Iter_upb m x
exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (bottom m k z)
exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z)
exd_cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA_1 m k z) -> exd m z
top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = z
bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z
degree_bound : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> degree m z <= ndN m
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z
exd_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (cA m k z) /\ exd m (cA_1 m k z)

```  
intros m z t H1 H2. split.
- intros [H3 H4]. split.
  + exact H4.
  + apply exds_orb_eq_ex_large; assumption.
- intros [H3 [i [H4 H5]]]. split.
  + exact H3.
  + apply (ex_j_exist_j m z t i). split.
    * exact H4.
    * exact H5.
```

original: intros m z t H1 H2. split. - intros [H3 H4]. split. + apply H4. + apply exds_orb_eq_ex_large; auto. - intros [H3 [i [H4 H5]]]. split. + apply H3. + apply (ex_j_exist_j m z t i). split. * apply H4. * apply H5.
